commit message:
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/w84death/BitTanksTest

Conflicts:

soldier movement on road: 1, bunker cost: 8
smoke size depends on damage level + random damage

in-game card, welcome message + start turn

map move to player bunker at turn end
movement indicator, new font, sample messages
